= Goal =

The goal of Apple Core is to provide guidelines and best practices for publishing herbarium specimen information as [http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/ Darwin Core].

= Scope =

The current scope of Apple Core is *vascular plants*.
Once this is covered and depending community feedback, we hope to enlarge the scope to:
 * Algae
 * Bryophyta
 * Paleobotany
 * ...
